answers.answer: Hi Meeno! Being overweight can cause problems conceiving...but 63 kgs doesn't sound like that much. I'm not really that familiar with metformin, but did your doctor give it to you just to lose weight, or are you taking it for any medical reasons?

If they gave you metformin it's probably either for diabetes or for PCOS.  I agree with Heather.  While you gained substantial weight for you, being 63 kgs isn't even in the overweight category and probably shouldn't affect your fertility.  However, if you are on metformin for PCOS, that will mess with your hormones and CAN affect your fertility.   If it is PCOS, you are still very young and very skinny (especially compared to most with pcos), so both of those things are very much in your favor and it shouldn't be too difficult for you.
